title: Is humanity smart enough to survive itself? | Jeanette Winterson
itunes:author: Jeanette Winterson
description: With quick wit and sharp insight, writer Jeanette Winterson lays out a vision of the future where human and machine intelligence meld -- forming what she calls "alternative intelligence" -- and takes a philosophical look at our species, asking: Are we smart enough to survive how smart we are? (Followed by a Q&A with TED's head of curation Helen Walters)
itunes:subtitle: Is humanity smart enough to survive itself? | Jeanette Winterson
